Name: Arta
Description: A region known for its historical landmarks, including the ancient city of Ambrakia and the famous Arta Bridge.

Name: Ioannina
Description: A region known for its beautiful landscapes, the city of Ioannina, and the stunning Lake Pamvotis.

Name: Thesprotia
Description: A coastal region known for its beautiful beaches, the ancient site of Dodona, and the port of Igoumenitsa.

Name: Preveza
Description: A region known for its stunning beaches, the ancient city of Nikopolis, and its proximity to the Ionian Sea.
